Title: Criminalizes the harassment of a child; and establishes a private right of action for harassment of a child
Summary: Criminalizes the harassment of a child when the perpetrator intentionally or knowingly harasses, annoys or alarms a child or a child's parent or guardian; establishes a private right of action for harassment of a child.
LawCode: Add ยง260.16, Pen L; add ยง52-e, Civ Rts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to criminalizing the harassment of a child; and to amend the civil rights law, in relation to establishing a private right of action for harassment of a child
